text:
on join:
    set {%player%.1} to 0
    set {%player%.2} to 0
    set {%player%.3} to 0
    set {%player%.1} to 0
    set {%player%.2} to 0
    set {%player%.3} to 0
    set {%player%.1} to 0
    set {%player%.2} to 0
    set {%player%.3} to 0
    set {%player%.} to 0
    set {%player%.} to 0
    set {%player%.} to 0
    set {%player%.PVE} to 0
    set {%player%.1} to 0
    set {%player%.2} to 0
    set {%player%.1} to 0
    set {%player%.2} to 0

#

#"&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &c"
#"&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &a &a&l"
#"&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &a&l &8[&1&lLv&a&l1&8]  &8(&a&8)"

on click with enchanted_book:
	name of player's tool contains "&a&l &1&l[&aLv1&1&l]"
	if {%player%.1} < 1:
		heal player by 3 hearts
		command "/execute %player% ~ ~ ~ particle happyVillager ~ ~1 ~ 1 1 1 0 30 force"
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &a&l &8[&d&lLv&a&l1&8]  &8(&a&8)"
		command "/playsound minecraft:entity.player.levelup ambient %player% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 0.53 1.0"
		set {%player%.1} to 10
		loop 10 times:
			wait 1 second
			remove 1 from {%player%.1}
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &a &a&l &8[&d&lLv&a&l1&8]"
	else:
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &c"

on click with enchanted_book:
	name of player's tool contains "&a&l &1&l[&bLv2&1&l]"
	if {%player%.2} < 1:
		heal player by 5 hearts
		command "/execute %player% ~ ~ ~ particle happyVillager ~ ~1 ~ 1 1 1 0 30 force"
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &a&l &8[&d&lLv&b&l2&8]  &8(&a&8)"
		command "/playsound minecraft:entity.player.levelup ambient %player% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 0.53 1.0"
		set {%player%.2} to 12
		loop 12 times:
			wait 1 second
			remove 1 from {%player%.2}
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &a &a&l &8[&d&lLv&b&l2&8]"
	else:
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &c"

on click with enchanted_book:
	name of player's tool contains "&a&l &1&l[&cLv3&1&l]"
	if {%player%.3} < 1:
		heal player by 7 hearts
		command "/execute %player% ~ ~ ~ particle happyVillager ~ ~1 ~ 1 1 1 0 30 force"
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &a&l &8[&d&lLv&c&l3&8]  &8(&a&8)"
		command "/playsound minecraft:entity.player.levelup ambient %player% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 0.53 1.0"
		set {%player%.3} to 12
		loop 12 times:
			wait 1 second
			remove 1 from {%player%.3}
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &a &a&l &8[&d&lLv&c&l3&8]"
	else:
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &c"

on click with enchanted_book:
	name of player's tool contains "&c&l &1&l[&aLv1&1&l]"
	if {%player%.1} < 1:
		loop all entities in radius 8 around player:
			loop-entity is not player:
				make player damage loop-entity by 5
				command "/playsound minecraft:entity.firework.blast ambient %loop-entity% ~ ~ ~ 0.5 0.53 0.5"
		command "/execute %player% ~ ~ ~ particle flame ~ ~ ~ 0 0 0 0.3 30 force"
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &c&l &8[&d&lLv&a&l1&8]  &8(&c&8)"
		command "/playsound minecraft:entity.firework.blast ambient %player% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 0.53 1.0"
		set {%player%.1} to 8
		loop 8 times:
			wait 1 second
			remove 1 from {%player%.1}
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &a &c&l &8[&d&lLv&a&l1&8]"
	else:
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &c"

on click with enchanted_book:
	name of player's tool contains "&c&l &1&l[&bLv2&1&l]"
	if {%player%.2} < 1:
		loop all entities in radius 8 around player:
			loop-entity is not player:
				make player damage loop-entity by 6
				command "/playsound minecraft:entity.firework.blast ambient %loop-entity% ~ ~ ~ 0.5 0.53 0.5"
		command "/execute %player% ~ ~ ~ particle flame ~ ~ ~ 0 0 0 0.3 30 force"
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &c&l &8[&d&lLv&b&l2&8]  &8(&c&8)"
		command "/playsound minecraft:entity.firework.blast ambient %player% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 0.53 1.0"
		set {%player%.2} to 8
		loop 8 times:
			wait 1 second
			remove 1 from {%player%.2}
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &a &c&l &8[&d&lLv&b&l2&8]"
	else:
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &c"

on click with enchanted_book:
	name of player's tool contains "&c&l &1&l[&cLv3&1&l]"
	if {%player%.3} < 1:
		loop all entities in radius 12 around player:
			loop-entity is not player:
				make player damage loop-entity by 7
				command "/playsound minecraft:entity.firework.blast ambient %loop-entity% ~ ~ ~ 0.5 0.53 0.5"
		command "/execute %player% ~ ~ ~ particle flame ~ ~ ~ 0 0 0 0.3 30 force"
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &c&l &8[&d&lLv&c&l3&8]  &8(&c&8)"
		command "/playsound minecraft:entity.firework.blast ambient %player% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 0.53 1.0"
		set {%player%.3} to 6
		loop 6 times:
			wait 1 second
			remove 1 from {%player%.3}
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &a &c&l &8[&d&lLv&c&l3&8]"
	else:
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &c"

on click with enchanted_book:
	name of player's tool contains "&e&l &1&l[&aLv1&1&l]"
	if {%player%.1} < 1:
		set {%player%.1} to 13
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &e&l &8[&d&lLv&a&l1&8]  &8(&4&8)"
		loop 2 times:
			command "/playsound minecraft:entity.lightning.impact ambient %player% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 0.53 1.0"
			command "/execute %player% ~ ~ ~ particle reddust ~ ~1 ~ 1 1 1 0 30 force"
			loop all entities in radius 6 around player:
				loop-entity is not player:
					make player damage loop-entity by 4
					command "/execute %loop-entity% ~ ~ ~ summon minecraft:lightning_bolt ~ ~10 ~"
			wait 2 seconds
		loop 13 times:
			wait 1 second
			remove 1 from {%player%.1}
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &a &e&l &8[&d&lLv&a&l1&8]"
	else:
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &c"

on click with enchanted_book:
	name of player's tool contains "&e&l &1&l[&bLv2&1&l]"
	if {%player%.2} < 1:
		set {%player%.2} to 13
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &e&l &8[&d&lLv&b&l2&8]  &8(&4&8)"
		loop 2 times:
			command "/playsound minecraft:entity.lightning.impact ambient %player% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 0.53 1.0"
			command "/execute %player% ~ ~ ~ particle reddust ~ ~1 ~ 1 1 1 0 30 force"
			loop all entities in radius 6 around player:
				loop-entity is not player:
					make player damage loop-entity by 5
					command "/execute %loop-entity% ~ ~ ~ summon minecraft:lightning_bolt ~ ~10 ~"
			wait 2 seconds
		loop 13 times:
			wait 1 second
			remove 1 from {%player%.2}
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &a &e&l &8[&d&lLv&b&l2&8]"
	else:
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &c"

on click with enchanted_book:
	name of player's tool contains "&e&l &1&l[&cLv3&1&l]"
	if {%player%.3} < 1:
		set {%player%.3} to 13
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &e&l &8[&d&lLv&c&l3&8]  &8(&4&8)"
		loop 2 times:
			command "/playsound minecraft:entity.lightning.impact ambient %player% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 0.53 1.0"
			command "/execute %player% ~ ~ ~ particle reddust ~ ~1 ~ 1 1 1 0 30 force"
			loop all entities in radius 10 around player:
				loop-entity is not player:
					make player damage loop-entity by 6
					command "/execute %loop-entity% ~ ~ ~ summon minecraft:lightning_bolt ~ ~10 ~"
			wait 2 seconds
		loop 13 times:
			wait 1 second
			remove 1 from {%player%.3}
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &a &e&l &8[&d&lLv&c&l3&8]"
	else:
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &c"

on click with enchanted_book:
	name of player's tool contains "&9&l"
	if {%player%.} < 1:
		loop all entities in radius 6 around player:
			loop-entity is not player:
				command "/effect %loop-entity% minecraft:slowness 4 2"
				command "/execute %loop-entity% ~ ~ ~ particle blockcrack ~ ~0.4 ~ 1 0 1 2 20 force @a 22"
				command "/playsound minecraft:entity.splash_potion.break ambient %loop-entity% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 1.0 1.0"
		command "/execute %player% ~ ~ ~ particle blockcrack ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1 1 30 force @a 22"
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &9&l  &8(&5&8)"
		command "/playsound minecraft:entity.firework.blast ambient %player% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 0.53 1.0"
		set {%player%.} to 10
		loop 10 times:
			wait 1 second
			remove 1 from {%player%.}
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &a &9&l"
	else:
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &c"

on click with enchanted_book:
	name of player's tool contains "&6&l"
	if {%player%.} < 1:
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &6&l  &8(&6&8)"
		command "/playsound minecraft:entity.endereye.launch ambient %player% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 1.2 1.0"
		command "/playsound minecraft:entity.firework.launch ambient %player% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 1.3 1.0"
		push player horizontally forwards at speed 3
		set {%player%.} to 7
		loop 7 times:
			wait 1 second
			remove 1 from {%player%.}
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &a &6&l"
	else:
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &c"

on click with enchanted_book:
	name of player's tool contains "&6&l"
	if {%player%.} < 1:
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &6&l  &8(&6&8)"
		command "/playsound minecraft:entity.endereye.launch ambient %player% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 1.2 1.0"
		command "/playsound minecraft:entity.firework.launch ambient %player% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 1.3 1.0"
		command "/effect %player% minecraft:levitation 1 20"
		set {%player%.} to 12
		loop 12 times:
			wait 1 second
			remove 1 from {%player%.}
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &a &6&l"
	else:
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &c"

on click with enchanted_book:
	name of player's tool contains "&a&lPVE"
	if {%player%.PVE} < 1:
		loop all players in radius 5 around player:
			heal loop-player by 4 hearts
			command "/playsound minecraft:entity.player.levelup ambient %loop-player% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 0.53 1.0"
		command "/execute %player% ~ ~ ~ particle happyVillager ~ ~1 ~ 2 2 2 0.3 100 force"
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &a&lPVE  &8(&a&8)"
		set {%player%.PVE} to 10
		loop 10 times:
			wait 1 second
			remove 1 from {%player%.PVE}
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &a &a&lPVE"
	else:
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &c"

on click with enchanted_book:
	name of player's tool contains "&b&l &1&l[&aLv1&1&l]"
	if {%player%.1} < 1:
		command "/effect %player% minecraft:speed 10 1"
		play "ENTITY.ENDERDRAGON.FLAP" to player at volume 20
		command "/execute %player% ~ ~ ~ particle snowshovel ~ ~1 ~ 1 1 1 0 40 force"
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &b&l &8[&d&lLv&a&l1&8]  &8(&6&8)"
		set {%player%.1} to 25
		loop 25 times:
			wait 1 second
			remove 1 from {%player%.1}
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &a &b&l &8[&d&lLv&a&l1&8]"
	else:
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &c"

on click with enchanted_book:
	name of player's tool contains "&b&l &1&l[&bLv2&1&l]"
	if {%player%.2} < 1:
		command "/effect %player% minecraft:speed 15 1"
		play "ENTITY.ENDERDRAGON.FLAP" to player at volume 20
		command "/execute %player% ~ ~ ~ particle snowshovel ~ ~1 ~ 1 1 1 0 40 force"
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &b&l &1&l[&bLv2&1&l]  &8(&6&8)"
		set {%player%.2} to 25
		loop 25 times:
			wait 1 second
			remove 1 from {%player%.2}
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &a &b&l &1&l[&bLv2&1&l]"
	else:
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &c"


on click with enchanted_book:
	name of player's tool contains "&f&l &1&l[&aLv1&1&l]"
	if {%player%.1} < 1:
		command "/effect %player% minecraft:resistance 10 0"
		play "BLOCK.ANVIL.PLACE" to player at volume 5
		command "/execute %player% ~ ~ ~ particle blockcrack ~ ~1 ~ 0.5 0.5 0.5 0 40 force"
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &f&l &8[&d&lLv&a&l1&8]  &8(&6&8)"
		set {%player%.1} to 25
		loop 25 times:
			wait 1 second
			remove 1 from {%player%.1}
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &a &f&l &8[&d&lLv&a&l1&8]"
	else:
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &c"

on click with enchanted_book:
	name of player's tool contains "&f&l &1&l[&bLv2&1&l]"
	if {%player%.2} < 1:
		command "/effect %player% minecraft:resistance 10 1"
		play "BLOCK.ANVIL.PLACE" to player at volume 5
		command "/execute %player% ~ ~ ~ particle blockcrack ~ ~1 ~ 0.5 0.5 0.5 0 40 force"
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &f&l &1&l[&bLv2&1&l]  &8(&6&8)"
		set {%player%.2} to 25
		loop 25 times:
			wait 1 second
			remove 1 from {%player%.2}
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &a &f&l &1&l[&bLv2&1&l]"
	else:
		message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &c"

#

#
on damage:
	name of victim's tool is "&b&l &cATK 1"
	if projectile is a arrow:
		chance of 90%
		message "&8[&c&lWEAPON&8] &b&l&8" to victim
		message "&8[&c&lWEAPON&8] &8&b&8..." to attacker
		cancel event
		shoot an arrow from the victim at speed 1
		command "/playsound minecraft:entity.player.attack.sweep ambient %victim% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 1.0 1.0"
		command "/playsound minecraft:entity.player.attack.sweep ambient %attacker% ~ ~ ~ 0.5 1.0 0.5"

#
on damage:
	name of victim's tool is "&b&l &cATK 2"
	make victim damage attacker by 3
	message "&8[&c&lWEAPON&8] &b&a" to victim
	command "/playsound minecraft:entity.player.attack.sweep ambient %victim% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 1.0 1.0"
	message "&8[&c&lWEAPON&8] &8&b&8..." to attacker
	chance of 30%
	cancel event
	message "&8[&c&lWEAPON&8] &b&a" to victim
	command "/playsound minecraft:entity.player.attack.sweep ambient %victim% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 1.0 1.0"
	command "/playsound minecraft:entity.player.attack.sweep ambient %attacker% ~ ~ ~ 0.5 1.0 0.5"

on damage:
	name of attacker's tool is "&b&l &cATK 3"
	chance of 30%:
		cancel event
		message "&8[&c&lWEAPON&8] &b&8..." to attacker
		stop
	chance of 30%:
		wait 1 tick
		make attacker damage victim by 6
		message "&8[&c&lWEAPON&8] &b&a" to attacker
		message "&8[&c&lWEAPON&8] &8&b&8..." to victim
	chance of 5%:
		command "/effect %attacker% minecraft:resistance 8 1"
		message "&8[&c&lWEAPON&8] &b&a" to attacker
	chance of 5%:
		command "/effect %attacker% minecraft:regeneration 5 1"
		message "&8[&c&lWEAPON&8] &b&a" to attacker

on damage:
	name of attacker's tool is "&b&l &cATK 2"
	chance of 50%:
		strike lightning effect at the victim
		message "&8[&c&lWEAPON&8] &b&a" to attacker
		message "&8[&c&lWEAPON&8] &8&b&8..." to victim
		stop
	cancel event
